name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde (itch)
description:
I made this game for a summer homework assignment for my English class.

Embedded with the unofficial Sok-Stories embedding tool.

You can also play this game here or in the Sok-Stories application. Sound only works in the application for some reason.

This is my second project made with Sok-Stories, the first of which can be found here. It was made for the Sok-Stories game jam.
